txt.en: 'The Orcs of Ak-ghru may be preparing to wage war on the Dunlendings -- though I doubt it, for they seem not to care about the Dunlendings moving through the Gravenwood -- but they might just as well be preparing to pour out of the Misty Mountains against Rohan.\n\n'I would have you clear-cut these Orcs just as they lay waste to the forest around them... perhaps then they will understand that Rohan is still strong.'
'Well done, [placeholder]... the Orcs of Ak-ghru will know now that the Rohirrim are not to be trifled with.'
'Clear-cut the Orcs as they clear-cut the forest.'
Orcs serving the White Hand are clear-cutting the forest and shipping the wood off to an unknown location.
Orcs can be found at Ak-ghru.\n\nElfrith has asked you to defeat many of the clear-cutting Orcs.
Elfrith is hiding beyond the bounds of Ak-ghru.\n\nYou should return to Elfrith with news of your success.
